TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit JulianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: Represents the Julian calendar.

span.span: Represents the Julian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 45 公元前恺撒很有序日历改革，从而产生了名为罗马儒略历的日历。In 45 B.C., Julius Caesar ordered a calendar reform, which resulted in the calendar called the Julian calendar. 罗马儒略历是公历日历以来的前身。The Julian calendar is the predecessor of the Gregorian calendar. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用信息类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 类只识别当前纪元。The class recognizes only the current era. 与不同的公历，罗马儒略历作为年份的四个无例外整除的定义为闰年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，每隔一天日历是不准确。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 罗马儒略历公历，如具有 12 个月 28 至 31 天内与： 年 1 月 （31 天）、 年 2 月 (28 或 29 天)、 年 3 月 （31 天）、 年 4 月 （30 天）、 5 月 （31 天）、 年 6 月 （30 天）、 年 7 月 （31 天）、 年 8 月 （31 天）、 年 9 月 （30 天）、 年 10 月 （31 天）年 11 月 （30 天） 和年 12 月 （31 天）。Like the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days). 2 月有 29 天在闰年和 28 在平年。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. 日期公元 2001 年 1 月 1 日The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在公历日历等同于在公元 2000 年 12 月 19 日in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the 19th day of December in the year 2000 A.D. 在罗马儒略历。in the Julian calendar. 目前，不使用任何支持的区域性类。Currently, the is not used by any of the cultures supported by the class. 因此，类可用于仅计算中罗马儒略历的日期。Therefore, the class can be used only to calculate dates in the Julian calendar. 每个对象支持一组的日历。Each object supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历和属性返回一个数组，包含所有支持的区域性的日历。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改使用的日历，该应用程序应设置的属性到新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的年份部分受影响，如果结果的月份之外的指定年份。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 10 月，包含 31 天，指定的日期是该月 31 日和的值`months`参数为 6，生成的年是一个多个指定的年份，生成的月份是年 4 月，并生成 day 为 30 天，即在年 4 月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果的值`months`参数为负，从而早于指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值方面罗马儒略历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/juliancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CS/juliancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/VB/juliancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的一天被指从一年的第一天的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，对的第一个月的第一天返回 1，和过去一天的上个月返回总天数该年份的。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year. 总计是相同的值返回的。The total is the same value as that returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值方面罗马儒略历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在日历中支持闰月的概念，特定月后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生的闰月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法返回一个数字，介于 1 到 13，该值指示指定日期与关联的月份之间。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果，在一年的第八个和第九个月之间存在闰月方法的第八个月内，闰第 8 个月的 9 和 10 中的第九个月返回 8。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同的公历，罗马儒略历作为年份的四个无例外整除的定义为闰年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，每隔一天日历是不准确。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 例如，1999 年不是闰年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1999 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰日是仅在闰年中发生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 罗马儒略历，在 2 月 29 日是唯一的闰日。In the Julian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下面的示例调用中每个纪元的五年的第二个月 （年 2 月） 的最后一天。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/juliancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/juliancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/juliancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同的公历，罗马儒略历作为年份的四个无例外整除的定义为闰年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，每隔一天日历是不准确。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 例如，1999 年不是闰年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1999 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰月是整月，仅在闰年中发生。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 罗马儒略历不具有任何闰月。The Julian calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下面的示例调用中的当前纪元中的五年的每月。The following example calls for all the months in five years in the current era. MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);

param.name: year
param.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 通过查找指定的唯一匹配项来确定在世纪`year`该 100 年范围内。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the specified `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果设置为 2029，则 100 年范围是从 1930 年至 2029年。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930 年，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 传递一个两位数的年份值 (小于 100) 导致该方法将值转换为四位数字值根据值，该值表示相应的纪元。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供对在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值，该方法返回的实际输入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供支持的日历范围之外的四位数字值或提供一个负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许两位数年份，以正确转换为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果此属性设置为 2029年，100 年范围是从 1930 年到 2029 年。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930 年，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 类不检测系统设置中的更改。The class does not detect changes in the system settings. 应用程序可以将此值设置为 99，以指示是按字面 2 位数字的年份。The application can set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，如果此属性设置为 99，100 年范围是从 0 （不是有效值对于大多数日历） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.

exception.span: -or- The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
